title: System Task Manager
description: Manage automated system tasks for library maintenance, metadata refreshing, and cache cleanup. Schedule recurring operations using Spring cron expressions.

systemTasks.sectionDesc: Execute tasks manually, monitor progress in real-time, and configure scheduled automation.

cron.validationPrefix: Cron expression must have exactly 6 fields (seconds, minutes, hours, day, month, weekday)
cron.updateSuccess: Scheduled task configuration has been updated successfully.
cron.updateError: Failed to update scheduled task configuration.

metadataReplace.label: Metadata Replace Mode:
metadataReplace.replaceMissingDesc: Only update books that are missing metadata information. Existing metadata will be preserved.
metadataReplace.replaceAllDesc: Replace all metadata for all books, even if they already have metadata. Use with caution as this will overwrite existing data.

progress.staleWarning: This task appears stuck. No updates received for over 5 minutes.
progress.stuckMessage: Task appears to be stuck (no updates received)

toast.taskQueuedDetail: {{name}} has been queued and will run in the background.
toast.dryRunQueuedDetail: {{name}} dry run has been queued. Preview results will be available in logs without making any database changes.
toast.alreadyRunningDetail: This task is already in progress or pending.
toast.cancelError: Failed to cancel the task. The task may already be completed or failed.
toast.metadataScheduledDetail: The metadata update for the selected books has been successfully scheduled.
toast.metadataAlreadyRunningDetail: A metadata refresh task is already in progress. Please wait for it to complete before starting another one.
toast.metadataFailedDetail: An unexpected error occurred while scheduling the metadata update. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.
